page.title: 07VILLAGE HALL A.G.M.
page.content: The A.G.M. of Chevington Village Hall was held 25th March, 1985 at 7.30 pm Chairman's Report Mrs. Pettit thanked all those who helped with Fete and Committee members work throughout the year. Mr. & Mrs. Ashton for being Treasurer & Secretary. Mr. & Mrs. Quantrill for all their hard work, Mr. Murrary for making more tables for the Village Hall. Mr. Papworth, Mrs. Thurlbourne and all organisations for their support. Secretary's Report Mrs.Ashton reported on the achievements of the fund raising events of the year, including a Fete, Jumble Sales, Knitwear Fashion Show, etc. Treasurer's Report Mr.Ashton was ill Mrs. Ashton reported that income over the year was $3139.88, expenditure $987.33. A vote of 14 to 1 that work on the car park be done.
